pullRequest.title: Migration and validation APIs for version upgrade
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
Migration and valdiation APIs for version upgrade
Cherry-pick of various commits:
opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security@0286850
opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security@472d652
opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security@2259e6b
opendistro-for-elasticsearch/deprecated-security-advanced-modules@8cf60f2
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

commit.message: Migration and valdiation APIs for version upgrade for advance module cherry pick of 8cf60f21e650aa16a77c39339a2455e7603c130b
Version upgrade fix cherry pick of 0286850f413016b1586a13189a9bb9d9b05a9bd3
version upgrade fix cherry pick of 472d652261c3a19affecfa594b93f7052dc20a68

Fixing version upgrade test

(cherry picked from commit 2259e6b743f4539e1798ef625d93d2972152a4fa)
Registering GET handler for Validate API

Merge pull request #1 from debjanibnrj/hardik-k-shah-master

Registering GET handler for Validate API

nodes.bodyText:
Curious why we have this property - Whats the use case of starting up nodes always accepting invalid config?
If it's just for loading during migration API call, we can just overload the function to do it?
Need to add NodesDn also to the migration
The class is used only within SecurityDynamicConfiguration, can it be made private static inside SecurityDynamicConfiguration?
